dict.acceptation: 报考者；申请求职者；攻读学位者；最后命运或结局如何已显然可见者；

sent.orig: Accept the candidate: If the candidate passes the retrial, both parties transact the probation procedures.
sent.trans: 候选人经用人单位复试并通过，办理正式录用手续。

sent.orig: A candidate candidate needs more than 50% of the vote to avoid a run-off election.
sent.trans: 一个候选人的选票数必须过半才可以避免决选。

sent.orig: A relaxed job candidate is a confident job candidate.
sent.trans: 心态放松的应试者是自信的。

sent.orig: The pro-west candidate Yushchenko and the pro-Russia candidate Yanukovych carried out extremely heated competition.
sent.trans: 亲西方的总统候选人尤先科和亲俄罗斯的亚努科维奇展开了激烈的竞争。

sent.orig: Al Sharpton, a civil-rights activist and former candidate, described him as Ross Perot with a resumé.
sent.trans: 民权运动活动家及前总统候选人阿尔。沙普敦把布伦伯格描述成有实践背景的罗斯。珀汝特（前总统候选人）。
